column1: At last - the USMCA trade agreement has been passed by both houses of Congress! This important deal will help create 160000 new jobs and delivers a big win for Wisconsin's farmers businesses and workers. https://t.co/8Mm1EqI9by

After months of negotiations we have agreed to a "Phase One" trade agreement with China! This new agreement removes barriers & opens up new markets for Wisconsin businesses farmers and workers. I applaud @POTUS and his fight for a better trade deal. https://t.co/YmVAQhISg2
Excited to join @realdonaldtrump for a rally in Milwaukee tonight! Between now and November we must work harder than ever to Keep America Great and ensure Wisconsin stays RED! https://t.co/PMIiKIXUBC

This is great news! The economy added over 145k jobs last month finishing the year strong with a total of 2 million new jobs created in 2019! In Congress my Republican colleagues and I will work with @POTUS to grow the economy even further this year. https://t.co/G7sswlfMtU
I also encourage you to pray for the families of John David Hetland and Matthew J. Ritter two brave officers we lost in the line of duty last year. Happy National Law Enforcement Appreciation Day! /2
Today we have the opportunity to thank our members of law enforcement for everything they do to keep Wisconsin safe. /1 https://t.co/gFIwAESEnb

Planned Parenthood's report this week shows why we must never give up our fight to protect life. My fellow Republican colleagues and I remain committed to fully defunding Planned Parenthood and ending the practice of tax-payer funded abortions. https://t.co/4DX7uNWX1H

I'm proud to join 211 other Republican members of Congress in asking the U.S. Supreme Court to reconsider their decision on Roe v. Wade. This landmark decision has allowed the practice of late-term abortion to flourish and must be reversed. https://t.co/lQhPjHwH1c

Even though Nancy Pelosi called for an impeachment vote that failed to gather a single Republican vote she refuses to send these articles to the Senate. It's time for Pelosi to do her job & allow our country to move on from this witch hunt. https://t.co/6Ypr6sVRRC

Thanks to your support 2019 was a truly remarkable year. That being said I'm looking forward to working even harder for the people of Wisconsin in 2020. Hope you and your family have a safe and Happy New Year! https://t.co/0OT5IVQEKn

On this day in 1945 Congress officially recognized our nation's Pledge of Allegiance. This pledge helps remind each of us what the American flag represents and how blessed we are to live in our great republic. Happy Pledge of Allegiance Day! https://t.co/EnGgFZFuEI

I’m so blessed to be able to spend the holiday in the company of my family and friends and I hope this Christmas finds you in the company of your loved ones as well. Today I wish all of you and yours a very Merry Christmas! https://t.co/hs2usG6R1e
Today I wish all of our Jewish friends across Wisconsin and our country Hanukkah Sameach! May you find blessings and comfort this holiday season. https://t.co/QuC4VXtKDx

The #USMCA is the 21st-century solution we need to promote free trade economic growth and cooperation between the United States Mexico and Canada. Congress should have approved this agreement a year ago and I was proud to vote in favor of it today. https://t.co/R1tWjio8qe

House Democrats continue to adopt a radical agenda by demanding the American people fund abortion services. As your representative to Congress I will always seek to protect life and stand against funding abortion services with taxpayer dollars. https://t.co/fxJnH1MnVp

228 years ago today the future of our young republic was changed forever. Thanks to the wisdom of our founding fathers the Bill of Rights recognizes our God-given freedoms and protects us from the threat of tyranny. https://t.co/TIgsSpIamI
I had the pleasure of attending 51 parades during this past year! It was fantastic meeting so many of you at these great events and I'm looking forward to an even better 2020. https://t.co/uheAZ0ZjYD

Today we have the opportunity to celebrate the birthday of our nation's oldest military unit the Army National Guard! Our Army National Guard helps protect our local communities as well as fight for our freedoms abroad. https://t.co/sqb2Gnb33j

The left continues to undermine the voice of the American people & push impeachment through Congress. I wish Democrats were as motivated to secure our border solve the student loan crisis and grow our economy as they are with removing @POTUS from office https://t.co/Vc4NilPpL6

Today we remember the 2403 service members and civilians lives that were lost during the Pearl Harbor attack. We will never forget the lives lost the bravery of those who fought on this day or the sacrifices that were made for our freedom. https://t.co/tnYdfxZRtG

Last week I had the pleasure of attending six Christmas and holiday parades! I thank Manitowoc Plymouth Grafton Oostburg Kiel and Sheboygan for inviting our team to participate. I'm excited to attend three more holiday parades this week and hope to see you all there! https://t.co/TK9fOc8EMJ

Our local charities and non-profit organizations serve as a blessing to many families across our community. On this Giving Tuesday I encourage you to donate to your favorite charity and help bless others! https://t.co/AKUnTYPxPR

Small businesses help power Wisconsin’s economy and deserve our appreciation. Today is an opportunity to show our support for them by shopping small. Happy #SmallBusinessSaturday! https://t.co/Ap2jDe3Ezc

Finally I’m so thankful for all of you and the support you’ve continued to provide me throughout the years. It means the world to me! On behalf of my family I’d like to wish you and yours a very happy and blessed Thanksgiving.
I’m deeply thankful for our servicemen and women who’ve answered the call to serve even when it means spending Thanksgiving far away from their families. They’re in our prayers today and always.
I’m thankful for my family and friends who provide endless support and always give me the guidance and love I need.

Thanksgiving isn’t just an opportunity to break bread with family and loved ones. It’s a chance for us to look back and reflect on our blessings. I’m a lucky man because I have so much to be thankful for. https://t.co/ZA7liAty6s

The Bible is particularly important to America. It's hard to understand either the Declaration of Independence or our Constitution without reading the Bible. The Bible still guides our nation & I was proud to honor its importance on the floor of Congress https://t.co/1rl3Xh8pFs

The longer House Democrats delay passing the #USMCA the more clear it becomes what their true intentions are. Democrats are so unwilling to compromise they are willing to jeopardize a trade deal that gives our workers and businesses a decisive victory. https://t.co/iYifYF3siq
Over 62% of Americans believe doctors who practice abortion should be held to the same standards as other physicians and 58% feel the same about abortion facilities. https://t.co/9VyiawvpTt

If it's immoral to issue a predatory loan to a member of the military how is it okay to give that kind of loan to anybody else? Congress has a unique opportunity to protect our citizens from this business practice and it's time we act. https://t.co/HoY5G1puKq

I strongly believe it’s immoral for businesses to be able to sign loans that require consumers to pay interest rates over 300%. We must look out for our friends & neighbors by ending the practice of predatory loans. You can read more about my plan here: https://t.co/rCUtV2BJk3

I had a great conversation with CNBC about why we need to protect our society's most vulnerable members from predatory loans and business practices that take advantage of their situation. You can learn more about my bipartisan proposal here: https://t.co/pXVNUJhIOb

Predatory loans are a growing problem in Wisconsin where payday loans have an average annual interest rate of 486%. Under current law we protect our military members from these loans but it's time we protect the rest of our citizens too. https://t.co/0tgp8VtC0E

I had a great time speaking to NPR to discuss my plan to prevent veterans and others from falling victim to predatory loans. It's important we protect our society's most vulnerable members from business practices that take advantage of their situation. https://t.co/uUbPKjZWfe
Today is another reminder freedom isn't free. We have veterans across our country to thank for their service and sacrifice. Happy Veterans Day to all who have served! https://t.co/PfcLH0bP0V

This is another prime example of liberal judicial activism at work. No doctor or healthcare provider should be forced to perform an abortion against their conscience. I will continue to fight for both freedom in the health industry & dignity of the unborn https://t.co/34akHoXMp0

Rather than allowing witnesses to respond to questions House Democrats have used committee hearings as a platform to grandstand and make false accusations against not only @POTUS but the brave men and women that protect our southern border. https://t.co/Dy2t7MgGrc

The Democrats’ focus on impeachment has been misguided and wrong since day one. Today’s vote is their fourth on impeachment. The first dates back to December 2017. It’s clear this has always been about politics and will never be about the evidence. https://t.co/dFr0eARunV

New trade deals will be good news for our farmers. Agreements with Japan Mexico and Canada in particular will open the door for many Wisconsin products. There is still work to be done but I’ll continue to fight for our farmers. https://t.co/aPOiMhRHSK

I enjoyed joining the Fresh Take show with @joshdukelow on @WHBY. We talked about a number of important issues including impeachment and trade. I hope you’ll take a minute to give it a listen and let me know what you think. https://t.co/Ehmfqv50Z5

As @POTUS noted this morning #ISIS leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi has been killed by U.S. Special Forces. This is a big victory for keeping the world safe and secure from these coward terrorists. So thankful for our servicemen & women who brought him down. https://t.co/jNTFWQbNDP

Enjoyed my time up in Manitowoc County this past Saturday walking in the Mishicot Pumpkinfest Parade with some of my local friends. We had a great time in the parade and talking with folks all along the way. Thanks to everyone who came out and joined us! https://t.co/WOwbryaBI8

Couldn't be more excited Vice President Mike Pence is coming to Pleasant Prairie! I'm looking forward to joining him and urging Congress to finally pass the USMCA trade agreement. https://t.co/qWyD9Ky0NO

While Nancy Pelosi and House Democrats have been caught up in their impeachment inquiry stunt my Republican colleagues and I have continued to focus on tangible solutions. We're more than ready to pass the #USMCA and secure our nation's borders.https://t.co/ojrGPxqAfP

I'm deeply saddened to hear the news of Representative Elijah Cummings passing away. His passion for public service was truly remarkable and will be missed by many. My prayers go out to his staff family and other loved ones today. https://t.co/o07dLIwOZa

Providing health care for illegal immigrants is not only outlandish but it will also cost our country billions of dollars. We need to instead focus on lowering costs and increasing access to high-quality care for our own citizens first. https://t.co/vpVEzP1xZR

Ratifying the #USMCA trade agreement will not only create 100k new jobs but it will ensure America establishes itself as an undisputed leader in digital trade. It's time for Democrats in Congress to allow a vote on this important trade deal.  https://t.co/pxzXn3DoWW
Wishing our Jewish friends and neighbors an easy and meaningful fast as they observe Yom Kippur. G'mar Tov! https://t.co/rBQx2LGv4a

With one of our most important fundraising deadlines tonight at midnight we need all the help we can get to finish this quarter strong. Can you chip in $10 or more today to help us reach our fundraising goal? I appreciate your generous support! https://t.co/0d3qBa4o3r
Shanah tovah to everyone in the U.S. Israel and all around the world celebrating Rosh Hashanah today. Have a happy healthy and sweet new year! https://t.co/QSm8m2tuEq

With one of our most important fundraising deadlines coming fast we need all the help we can get to finish this quarter strong. Can you chip in $10 or more today to help us reach our fundraising goal? I appreciate your generous support! https://t.co/a8sYEfNsm7

Nothing - including the Left's impeachment charade - should delay the passage of USMCA which would serve as a huge win for our agricultural community. It's time for Pelosi to act so that our farmers can get a more fair deal. https://t.co/j0jznLhRF2

Today on this Voter Registration Day you have a great opportunity to participate in our legislative process! If you need to update your voter registration information or register to vote for the first time you can do so here: https://t.co/xSFGEtqyJb https://t.co/md3Lr8YVzy

While Democrats have decided to protect their friends at Planned Parenthood at all costs the House GOP & I remain committed to protecting life instead. We seek to defund Planned Parenthood and a vote on the Born-Alive Abortion Survivors Protection Act. https://t.co/6wNqDAmuW0

Nancy Pelosi’s plan to establish a 95% tax on over 250 common prescriptions is outright dangerous and could lead to many not having access to the medicine they desperately need. We must stand against this government overreach on our healthcare. https://t.co/jymvxjSkwy

The more Democrats push impeachment hearings the more the American people are tired of it. We must instead focus on helping our workers & farmers by securing the USMCA trade deal which will create 100k new jobs and puts America's interests first. https://t.co/annBEX2YGj

On this day 232 years ago the trajectory of our nation changed forever. When the founding fathers met in Philadelphia to sign the U.S. Constitution they weren’t just signing a piece of paper - they were securing the destiny of America https://t.co/2upCqS1Suv

I'm excited to see the progress of the border wall continue! Securing our southern border is a vital step in protecting our nation & will help us greatly in efforts to enforce our laws. Congress must help ensure the wall is finished as soon as possible! https://t.co/P3BIxFvbKn

Each time Democrats like Bernie Sanders roll out a new version of their so-called "Green New Deal" it becomes more clear the focus is on implementing radical economic plans than it is about addressing the real problems our country faces. https://t.co/WPUSyFoi68

We will never forget the attacks that took place on this day eighteen years ago. Today we remember the innocent lives that were taken the heroic acts by our nation's first responders and the unbreakable unity our country still has to this day. https://t.co/0eLFLfarLR

While Democrats are focused on a government takeover of our healthcare system my Republican colleagues and I are focused on creating more jobs removing burdensome regulations and supporting our working class through free-market principles. https://t.co/54Uq057TOt

The House Democratic leadership should stop playing partisan games and allow a vote on the USMCA trade agreement once and for all. The American people support this trade deal that will create 100k new jobs and open up new markets for our farmers. https://t.co/F7OSSfHjYl

Tremendous news with August jobs numbers surpassing expectations! With over 195k jobs added last month and more than 1 Million jobs added this year so far @POTUS’s conservative pro-growth agenda remains as strong as ever! https://t.co/Mv22mVJEtL

Another example of our brave men & women in the CBP risking their lives to save others. With Hurricane Dorian inflicting damage across the Caribbean & quickly approaching the United States we are fortunate to have the CBP helping lead the way. https://t.co/ypnLq0WDQ2

I enjoyed joining @joshdukelow’s #FreshTake show on @whby last week to discuss immigration trade jobs and more. My segment begins at the 38:45 mark. Give it a listen and let me know what you think! https://t.co/sFAE4GXnOT

As we spend time with our loved ones this day let’s remember the American worker and their unmatched spirit of pride. No matter the career or field all of us are emboldened by the dignity of hard work. Have a happy and safe Labor Day! https://t.co/rMs2FAFvUb

Can’t wait for the @BadgerFootball season to kick-off tonight. Hope my alma mater gets a “W” in their game against @USFFootball and that it’s the start of a great year for the team. Will you be tuning in tonight? #OnWisconsin #B1GFootball https://t.co/S85GdEoHAY

@RepSeanDuffy has done a terrific job representing Wisconsin in congress and will be sorely missed by many. I wish Sean and his family all the best in these trying times and hope to see them back in the Capitol sometime in the future. https://t.co/hS00uWzWdD

Senator Bernie Sanders is once again proposing policy he has no plans to pay for. His $16 Trillion ‘Green New Deal’ would cause our deficits to skyrocket bankrupt the economy and set back American energy production for years to come. https://t.co/94Tgj3g6sN
I had a great conversation with the folks over at @MacIverWisc about what we need to do right now to solve the border crisis. You can listen to the whole interview here: https://t.co/Ow4neGorKe

Last week I was happy to accept the Spirit of Enterprise Award from the U.S. Chamber of Commerce. I will continue to support businesses & workers in our region by fighting for policies that eliminate red tape lower taxes & help create jobs in the process. https://t.co/cCA0vn8uwS

This is another troubling story that demonstrates exactly why we need to pass legislation to protect babies born from botched abortions. My fellow House Republicans & I will continue to press this issue forward & do whatever it takes to protect life. https://t.co/yj7tCmbMlV

We need to build an immigration system that supports our citizens first while attracting the best that other countries have to offer. We can't support everyone due to rising costs but we can create a stable environment for citizens & immigrants alike. https://t.co/RRGjF4M1Sq

Thanks to @POTUS's #AmericaFirst agenda we’re seeing the wage gap shrink led by an encouraging increase in blue-collar wages. This is tremendous news for our economy especially here in Wisconsin. https://t.co/QjgzohuiOA

By ratifying the #USMCA trade agreement we will create 100K+ jobs and grow the economy. The Democrats led by Speaker Pelosi must end their obstruction and allow for a vote on this vital bipartisan deal take place immediately. https://t.co/H5qmovIdam

More and more Americans are not only finding jobs but they also are seeing their wages continue to rise. This is why I’m a proud supporter of President Trump’s successful economic agenda of lower taxes less regulation and better trade deals. https://t.co/mqWYIRJzmP

Republican leaders have made job creation and economic growth a priority and our policies are working. Great to see another solid jobs report in July. We can continue to keep things on track by pursuing proven conservative solutions. https://t.co/A9U7kMbfSu

Enjoyed speaking with @JohnMuirWTAQ on @WHBL about the crisis at the southern border and the outright lies being told about the situation by Democrats. @POTUS’ actions have helped calm the crisis but we need to do more to secure our border. https://t.co/CUyuP36dsi

Spent some time at the Marquette County Fair and met Sawyer and the duck he's been raising. Seeing the hard work these young people put into raising livestock is always a highlight of our fairs. https://t.co/90lMEeM47t

Something we can all agree on is that the endless robocalls need to end. That's why I voted yesterday in favor of the bi-partisan Stopping Bad Robocalls Act to ensure illegal robocallers are penalized and stopped. https://t.co/EB0PLRnwQn

The Dems wasted everyone's time today and the past 6 months with this spectacle. Their "leadership" of the House has been the ultimate disaster with nothing to show for it. Perhaps they can spend less time on pointless hearings & more time on governing. https://t.co/wdAx1VSut4

Our immigration officials need more support to process the overwhelming number of asylum requests they're receiving. Operation Safe Return will do that by speeding up the process of denying illegitimate claims so legitimate ones can be accommodated. https://t.co/3IbyuDIqhq

When it comes to one of Bernie's top policies he talks the talk but doesn't walk the walk. He should be willing to live under the far-left laws he advocates for. https://t.co/PFKSNsY9ed
Congresswoman Ilhan Omar's comments are insensitive and wrong. Israel is a strong American ally in a volatile region and we ought to stand by them just as they stand by us. https://t.co/COOzsYxBcV

We're proud of our craft beer producers here in Wisconsin! Did you know they make enough to provide every resident (over the age of 21 of course) with 5 gallons a year? What's your favorite Wisconsin brew? https://t.co/yVIvubtb1f

The 4th is always one of my favorite holidays especially when I get to spend it with folks around the 6th District. Thanks to everyone who came out to the parades especially Team Grothman volunteers. I hope everyone had a safe and relaxing holiday weekend! https://t.co/MsBI1A33qi

Even Obama's Homeland Security sec agrees that the Democrats' immigration plans are extreme and out of touch with reality! By refusing the enforce our laws and even changing them to make border crossings legal they are putting America's safety at risk. https://t.co/Jrj35dny0f

Strong start to the weekend at today's Theresa Firemen's Parade where I also ran into my nephew and the Badger band! What are you up to this weekend? https://t.co/nT1VieJg6G
